entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
